name: The HeatWave
description:
The HeatWave

Control two characters separately, to be played in co-op.

Controls :

A - D // Player 1 left - right

ArrowLeft - ArrowRight // Player 2 left - right

Directions :

Catch all citizen jumping form the burning building except those who are running on fire. Avoid getting far from your comrade since the trampoline might stretch and break!

Done in Montreal Creative Game Jam from january 16th to january 18th 2015.
